thread.title: New Girl FINALLY reveals Schmidt's first name (and there's no way you'd ever have guessed it)
thread.title_full: New Girl FINALLY reveals Schmidt's first name (and there's no way you'd ever have guessed it)

author: Natalie Evans
title: New Girl FINALLY reveals Schmidt's first name (and there's no way you'd ever have guessed it)
text:
Schmidt's first name has never been known until now (Photo: FOX Image Collection) 
Winston Schmidt. Yes, really. 
But wait - the show already has a Winston, right? 
Yes - and now it has two. The cast of New Girl (Photo: FOX Image Collection) 
The character revealed his first name to his best friend, the Winston we already know played by Lamorne Morris. 
Schmidt tells Winston that from now on he wants to go by his full name, Winston Schmidt. 
Needless to say, the original Winston is not happy about this decision. Schmidt's name comes as a shock (Photo: FOX Image Collection) 
For what it's worth, if his first name isn't enough for you, Fox issued a press release tonight that specified Schmidt's cumbersome full name is actually 'Winston Saint-Marie Schmidt. 
What do you think about Schmidt's first name, Winston? Will he always simply be "Schmidt" to you? Tell us in the comments below. Like us on Facebook
